p: TEM and HRTEM images of 5%Fe-TiO 2 nanoparticles were measured to study their morphology and microstructure ( Figure 7a–c). From Figure 7a,b, it can be seen that the 5% Fe-TiO 2 particles remain the same spherical particles as the prepared pure TiO 2, with a particle size of 11.3 ± 1.9 nm. The lattice stripes of 5%Fe-TiO 2 particles are shown in Figure 7c, and the lattice stripe spacing of 0.352 to 0.360 nm corresponds to the (101) crystal plane of the TiO 2 anatase phase. EDX mapping characterization was carried out to determine the doping status of Fe 3+ in TiO 2. From Figure 7d, it can be seen that Fe, Ti and O elements are uniformly distributed in the whole visual field, indicating that Fe has formed uniform doping in TiO 2 and also proving that the uniform doping of Fe elements could be realized in IS-RPB.
